properties.displayName: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With WINZIP
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -min " or ProcessCommandLine contains " -a ") and ProcessCommandLine contains "-s\"" and (ProcessCommandLine contains "winzip.exe" or ProcessCommandLine contains "winzip64.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilit
